extendedInfo.description: The most lovely endless 'Run&Jump' platform game.Long long ago in prehistoric time, there was a little crocodile called Croco. He got lost during a large-scale migration.He needed to begin the journey all by himself now. To keep alive, he needs to eat as many fruits as he can while running.However, he is not alone. There are lots of weapons left by his companions to give him special abilities. You can help feeding Croco fruits and reaching for power-ups.So flex your fingers and get ready to help Croco!-------------------------------------------------------How to play:- Tap the screen to get Croco to jump over obstacles and predators.- Avoid the raptor flying up overhead.- Keep feeding him fruits along the way or he'll loose strength and starve.- Use power-ups to get special abilities.-------------------------------------------------------Highlighted Features:- Endless running game.- Four different worlds to explore.- Power-up shop (crazy pepper, death helmet, fruit magnetâ¦).- OpenFeint leaderboard, to compete with the players around the world!

reviews.comment: I have to say im addicted to this game! but i hate that there is no lifes..  After i downloaded it i never stopped playing it! Fun but boring at times
